content: here you can see the project in its most basic form and I have sculpted out the
Wildcat face with sculpey that's an oven dry clay super sculpey actually and then
I did the UK so what I did was I printed up the UK letters on a printer and then
cut them out and made a template so I could create the UK out of sculpey also
so those are on the plaque that I'm gonna use in the plaque you know of
course hasn't been paying their anything so this is a very basic kind of blocking
out stage as we move on you can see I've got a lot
more detail going on with the Wildcat face I've actually added some fangs you
can see the paw there too which is next to it now the paw I actually have the
wire into the into the paw because it's going to be it's going to be extremely
coming out of the plaque itself so I wanted to have a strength since it's
reaching out so far but the the face now you can see the details the eyes I just
pushed beads into the face to get the eyes and the teeth are made from epoxy
sculpt which is a harder kind of multi-part epoxy clay and that will give
them that will make it so they won't break off as easily so I'm going to
finish up the teeth and then I'm going to add claws to the paw
now here we go you can see I have all the sculpting done and I've begun to
paint so I painted the plaque in the UK colors and the lettering so you can see
the Wildcat there it hasn't been painted at all yet but you can see the details
on it I have the claws in the paw and those are the from the epoxy sculpt and
the teeth are the same way I've got all the teeth in and you can see there also
that I've got whiskers on this beast and I use an old paintbrush and cut the the
bristles off and stuck them into the to the sculpt to give it whiskers
so here's my finished plaque and I think it really came out nice you can see the
Wildcat they're coming out let me give that you have a closer look there so you
can see the pretty vicious looking teeth there I also have the whiskers on this
thing which is really nice these are from a brush so that came out really
cool you can see the dimensionality of that claw popping out and I really like
how far that's coming out of the plaque and I just have a hole in the back you
can hang this up and I glossed the front so give it a nice a nice finish all
right there we go there's a pretty cool UK plaque with some extreme
dimensionality makes it look really cool and I'll see you next time on my craft
Oh you
